content: You reached us. Now, you need to provide details on whatever the problem is. Screenshots of error messages, plus of your incoming server settings pane and your SMTP server settings pane. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content:
As david says - we would need to know what the error message says and images of your current server settings.

Located some info: https://www.freeparking.co.nz/help/article/freeparking-email-settings

server name seems to be the same no matter whether Imap Pop or SMTP The Ports do vary and you must use the correct one for the type of protocol.

Imap

  • server name: mailx.freeparking.co.nz
  • Port: 993
  • Connection Security: SSL/TLS
  • Authentication Method: Normal Password
  • Username: usually full email address
  • Password- same one you use to access webmail account

Pop

  • server name: mailx.freeparking.co.nz
  • Port:995
  • Connection Security: SSL/TLS
  • Authentication Method: Normal Password
  • Username: usually full email address
  • Password- same one you use to access webmail account


SMTP They seem to imply they do not offer a secure method of sending which is a bit of a concern to say the least. I would first try the Connection Security using STARTTLS with Authentication 'Normal Password', but the alternative are 'None' using 'password transmitted insecurely'

  • server name: mailx.freeparking.co.nz
  • Port: 587
  • Connection Security: try 'STARTTLS' but info implies no security so 'None'
  • Authentication Method: Normal Password or if 'None' above then 'password transmitted insecurely'
  • Username: usually full email address
  • Password- same one you use to access webmail account
creator: Toad-Hall

creator: davidsk

content:
HI, DAVID. Not quite correct. Following a recent Thunderbird update it appeared that 27,112 e-mails had disappeared,.I then purchased Recovit by Wondershare in an attempt to recover these e-mails. My desktop Lenovo died soon after my purchase of the Recoverit program, I am not certain if these issues are related. But when I took the computer's hard drive into memory Express they told me the only file they could see was Wondershare (Recoverit)

The issue now is twofold A) Find out what is going wrong, and why can't I get on my Thunderbird to access my r-mail and B) Find someone much smarter than I to recover the above mentioned files. Happy to pay for this BTW.

Any help on either or both would be greatly appreciated.

Tohle se u Thunderbirdu obƒças st√°v√° ‚Äì jde vƒõt≈°inou o zmatek mezi **IMAP slo≈ækami** a jejich mapov√°n√≠m na serveru. Vysvƒõtl√≠m a d√°m postup, co zkusit: --- Proƒç m√°≈° dvƒõ Doruƒçen√© 1. **IMAP server** m√° svoje slo≈æky (Inbox, Drafts, Sent‚Ä¶). Thunderbird si je mapuje na ƒçesk√© n√°zvy (Doruƒçen√° po≈°ta, Koncepty‚Ä¶). 2. Pokud do≈°lo k chybn√©mu mapov√°n√≠, m≈Ø≈æe se st√°t, ≈æe slo≈æka ‚ÄûDoruƒçen√° po≈°ta‚Äú se zobraz√≠ dvakr√°t ‚Äì jedna pr√°zdn√° (nepou≈æ√≠van√°) a druh√° aktivn√≠ (kam re√°lnƒõ chod√≠ po≈°ta), t≈ôeba i pod *Koncepty*. --- Jak to opravit 1. **Zkontroluj nastaven√≠ serveru** * V menu **N√°stroje ‚Üí Nastaven√≠ √∫ƒçt≈Ø ‚Üí Nastaven√≠ serveru**. * Tam uvid√≠≈°, kter√° slo≈æka je nastaven√° jako *Ko≈ôenov√° slo≈æka √∫ƒçtu* a kde je *Doruƒçen√° po≈°ta*. 2. **Nastaven√≠ zvl√°≈°tn√≠ch slo≈æek** * V **Nastaven√≠ √∫ƒçt≈Ø ‚Üí Kopie a slo≈æky** zkontroluj, kam m√° Thunderbird ukl√°dat Doruƒçenou, Odeslanou, Koncepty atd. * Pokud tam vid√≠≈°, ≈æe ‚ÄûDoruƒçen√° po≈°ta‚Äú je odkazovan√° na slo≈æku uvnit≈ô *Koncept≈Ø*, zmƒõ≈à ji na tu spr√°vnou (tu v rootu √∫ƒçtu). 3. **Odebr√°n√≠ nechtƒõn√© slo≈æky** * Pokud slo≈æka vznikla jen chybnƒõ na stranƒõ Thunderbirdu, m≈Ø≈æe≈° na ni kliknout **prav√Ωm ‚Üí Odstranit**. * Pokud to nejde, znamen√° to, ≈æe slo≈æka fyzicky existuje na serveru (IMAP). Pak se p≈ôihlas do webmailu (nebo pou≈æij jin√©ho klienta) a tam ji sma≈æ. Po synchronizaci v Thunderbirdu zmiz√≠. 4. **Obnoven√≠ struktury** * Po √∫prav√°ch je dobr√© na √∫ƒçtu kliknout prav√Ωm ‚Üí **Odbƒõr‚Ä¶** a od≈°krtnout slo≈æky, kter√© nechce≈°. * Nakonec Thunderbird restartuj, a slo≈æky by se mƒõly uk√°zat spr√°vnƒõ. --- üëâ Nejƒçastƒõj≈°√≠ ≈ôe≈°en√≠:
  • V *Kopie a slo≈æky* nastavit Doruƒçenou p≈ô√≠mo na `Inbox` v rootu.

content: Filters for an account are in a file called msgfilterrules.dat. there is one in each account folder. It is a simple text file, so easily read and edited. If the setups are 100% identical, you should be able to copy the file from your PC to the other persons's PC.
creator: davidsk
